Cities bucket list

Card gallery with custom HTML

03-Aug-2024

Source: vignettes/cities.qmd

A recreation of the 100 cities bucket list.

Code
library(pixture)

Generate captions.

captions <- paste(
  paste0("<div style='font-size:1.8em;margin-bottom:-0.1em;'><b>", dfr$city, "</b></div><br>"),
  paste0("<div style='text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:3px;margin-bottom:0.3em;'><b>", dfr$country, "</b></div><br>"),
  paste0("<div style='line-height:1.2;'>", dfr$tagline, "</div>")
)

It would be better to just add CSS classes above and set the styles in a separate CSS document. Refresh the page to see shuffle in action.

pixgallery(
  dfr$paths, 
  captions, 
  caption_valign = "center", 
  caption_halign = "center", 
  h = "300px", 
  w = "250px",
  layout = "mosaic",
  border_radius = "10px",
  shuffle = TRUE,
  link = FALSE
)
